text: The Friendship Bridge (, ) is an arch bridge connecting the Brazilian city of Foz do Iguaçu and the Paraguayan city of Ciudad del Este. ==History and importance== The bridge was opened to traffic in 1965. The space between the main arch is 290 metres (303 yards in total). The bridge itself is 552.4 m long. The bridge is extremely important to the economies of both Foz do Iguaçu and Ciudad del Este. BR-277 begins immediately after the end of the bridge in the Brazilian side, and National Route N° 7 in the Paraguayan side. ==Gallery== File:Ponte da amizade.jpg File:Ciudad del Este puente de la Amistad.jpg Image:Brazil.Paraguay.border.jpg|The exact border point along the bridge. ==See also== *Brazil–Paraguay border ==References== ==External links== * Category:Deck arch bridges Category:Concrete bridges Category:Bridges in Brazil Category:Bridges in Paraguay Category:International bridges Category:Brazil–Paraguay border crossings Category:Ciudad del Este Category:Foz do Iguaçu Category:Bridges over the Paraná River Category:Bridges completed in 1965 Category:Buildings and structures in Paraná (state) Category:Transport in Paraná (state)
title: Friendship Bridge (Brazil–Paraguay)
